title: Pizzarea Capalaba
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This little pizzeria began offering a separate menu for vegans in 2015, and maintains a separate facebook page for this. Uses Notzarella vegan cheese and Tofurky products. Vegan such as pepperoni pizza, no-meatlovers, gourmet veg, and veggie patch pizza using vegan cheese. Sells vegan gluten free cupcakes from Cloverly. Vegan pizzas are prepared separately and a separate deep fryer is used.
